s.d: Skill at Anchoring Deployables. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at managing corp finances. 5% discount on all fees at non-hostile NPC station if acting as CFO of a corp.
Skill at managing corp research.

Basic corporation operation. +10 corporation members allowed per level.
Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect

Advanced corporation operation. +200 corporation members allowed per level.
Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect

Skill at operating multiracial corporations. Extra 20% corporation members of other race than CEO allowed per skill level. Percentage is based on CEO's corporation management skills, not the number of people in the corporation.
Note: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect.
Skill at factory operation.
Skill at directing a corporation's espionage division.

Advanced corporation operation. +50 members per level.
Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect
Skill at managing corporation offices.
Skill at managing station refineries. Increases mineral yield of refinery by 5% if acting as station manager.

Advanced corporation operation. +1000 corporation members allowed per level.
Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect
Skill at setting up Starbases

Skill at using starbase weapon systems. Allows control of one array per level. Arrays must be placed outside of the forcefield to be controlled.
Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
The operation and management of spacestations.
Allows operation of drone control units. 1 extra drone control unit per level.
Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus to advanced Amarr drone damage per level.
Specialization in the operation of advanced Caldari drones. 2% bonus to advanced Caldari drone damage per level.
Skill at controlling scout drones. 5% Bonus to drone damage of light and medium drones per level.
Increases drone hit points. 5% bonus to drone shield, armor and hull hit points per level.
Allows a captain to better maintain its drones. 20% bonus to drone damage, drone mining yield per level.
Increases drone max velocity.
Increases drone optimal range.
Skill at remote controlling drones. Can operate 1 drone per skill level.
Allows operation of electronic warfare drones. 3000m drone control range bonus per level.
Allows operation of fighter drones. 20% increase in fighter damage per level.
Specialization in the operation of advanced Gallente drones. 2% bonus to advanced Gallente drone damage per level.
Skill at controlling heavy combat drones. 5% Bonus to drone damage per level.
Skill at controlling mining drones. 5% Bonus to mining drone yield per skill level.
Specialization in the operation of advanced Minmatar drones. 2% bonus to advanced Minmatar drone damage per level.
Allows operation of logistic drones. 5% increased repair amount per level.
Skill at controlling salvage drones. 5% increased salvage chance per level.

Skill at controlling scout combat drones.
Bonus: drone range increased by 5000 meters per skill level.
Skill at controlling sentry drones. 5% bonus to Sentry Drone damage per level.
Skill at using Cloaking devices. 10% per level reduction in targeting delay after uncloaking per skill level.
Skill at creating effective cynosural fields. 50-unit reduction in liquid ozone consumption for module activation per skill level.
Operation of ECM/ECCM jamming systems. 5% less capacitor need for ECM systems per skill level.
Basic understanding of spaceship sensory and computer systems. 5% Bonus to ship CPU output per skill level.
Skill at installing Electronic upgrades, e.g. signal amplifier, Co-Processors and backup sensor array. 5% reduction of sensor upgrade CPU needs per skill level.
Advanced understanding of signal waves. 10% bonus to falloff for ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Tracking Disruptors and Target Painters per skill level.
Skill at the long-range operation of electronic warfare systems. 10% bonus to optimal range of ECM, Remote Sensor Dampers, Tracking Disruptors and Target Painters per skill level.
Skill at long range targeting. 5% Bonus to targeting range per skill level.
Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.
Operation of projected ECM jamming systems. 5% decreased duration per skill level.
Skill at using propulsion/warpdrive jammers. 5% Reduction to warp scrambler and stasis web capacitor need per skill level.
Skill at using remote sensor booster/damper. 5% less capacitor need for sensor link per skill level.
Skill at the operation of target jamming equipment. 5% bonus to scan strength of all ECM jammers per skill level.
Skill at the operation of remote sensor dampers. 5% bonus to remote sensor dampers' scan resolution and targeting range suppression per skill level.
Skill at operating Targeting systems. 5% improved targeting speed per skill level.
Advanced understanding of target painting technology. 5% bonus to target painter modules' signature radius multiplier per skill level.
Skill at operating scanners. 5% improvement in scanner speeds per skill level.
Skill at using target painters. 5% less capacitor need for target painters per skill level.
Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.
Advanced understanding of tracking disruption technology. 5% bonus to Tracking Disruptor modules’ tracking speed and optimal range disruption per skill level.
Skill at using remote weapon disruptors. 5% less capacitor need for weapon disruptors per skill level.
Operation of capital sized energy transfer array and other energy emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of capital energy emission systems per skill level.
Operation of capital sized shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital shield emission system modules per skill level.
Operation of capital shield boosters and other shield modules. 2% reduction in capacitor need for capital shield boosters per skill level.
To active shield hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Shield EM resistance when the modules are not active To passive shield hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Shield EM resistance
Operation of energy transfer array and other energy emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of energy emission weapons per skill level.
Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. 5% reduction in CPU needs of modules requiring Energy Grid Upgrades per skill level.
Skill at regulating your ship's overall energy capacity. 5% bonus to capacitor capacity per skill level.
Skill at using smartbombs. 5% decrease in smartbomb duration per skill level.
Skill at operating your ship's capacitor, including the use of capacitor boosters and other basic energy modules. 5% reduction in capacitor recharge time per skill level.
Basic understanding of spaceship energy grid systems. 5% Bonus to ship's powergrid output per skill level.

To active shield hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Shield Explosive resistance when the modules are not active To passive shield hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Shield Explosive resistance
To active shield hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Shield Kinetic resistance when the modules are not active To passive shield hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Shield Kinetic resistance
Improved skill for regulating energy flow to shields. 2% less capacitor need for shield boosters per skill level.
Operation of shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for shield emission system modules per skill level.
Skill at regulating a spaceship's shield systems. 5% bonus to shield capacity per skill level.
Skill at operating a spaceship's shield systems, including the use of shield boosters and other basic shield modules. 5% reduction in shield recharge time per skill level.
Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 5% reduction in shield upgrade power needs.

Skill at preventing damage from penetrating the shield, including the use of shield hardeners and other advanced shield modules. Reduces the chance of damage penetrating the shield when it falls below 25% by 5% per skill level, with 0% chance at level 5
To active shield hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Shield Thermal resistance when the modules are not active To passive shield hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Shield Thermal resistance
Reduces the powergrid needs of weapon turrets and launchers by 2% per skill level.
Operation of capital energy turrets. 5% Bonus to capital energy turret damage per level.
Operation of capital hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to capital hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of capital projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to capital projectile turret damage per level.
Allows better control over the capacitor use of weapon turrets. 5% reduction in capacitor need of weapon turrets per skill level.
Basic turret operation skill. 2% Bonus to weapon turrets' rate of fire per skill level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced Large Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Artillery Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced large autocannons. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Autocannon Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced large beam lasers. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Beam Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced large blasters. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Blaster Specialization.
Operation of large energy turrets. 5% Bonus to large energy turret damage per level.
Operation of large hybrid turret. 5% Bonus to large hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of large projectile turret. 5% Bonus to large projectile turret damage per level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced large pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Pulse Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced large railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Railgun Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced Medium Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Artillery Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Autocannon Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium beam lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Beam Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Blaster Specialization.
Operation of medium energy turret. 5% Bonus to medium energy turret damage per level.
Operation of medium hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to medium hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of medium projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to medium projectile turret damage per level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Pulse Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Railgun Specialization.
Improved ability at hitting moving targets. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret tracking speeds.
Skill at the rapid discharge of weapon turrets. 4% bonus per skill level to weapon turret rate of fire.
Skill at long-range weapon turret firing. 5% bonus to weapon turret optimal range per skill level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced Small Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Artillery Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced small Autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Autocannon Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of small Beam Lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Beam Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced small blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Blaster Specialization.
Operation of small energy turrets. 5% Bonus to small energy turret damage per level.
Operation of small hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to small hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of small projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to small projectile turret damage per level.
Specialist training in the operation of small pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Pulse Laser Specialization.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced small railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Railgun Specialization.
Knowledge of spaceships' structural weaknesses. 3% bonus per skill level to the damage of all weapon turrets.
Skill at the operation of siege modules. 50-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level.
Advanced understanding of zero-G physics. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret accuracy falloff.
Knowledge of gunnery computer systems, including the use of weapon upgrade modules. 5% reduction per skill level in the CPU needs of weapon turrets, launchers and smartbombs.
Further training in the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per skill level.

Specialization in Arkonor processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Arkonor refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Bistot processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Bistot refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Crokite processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Crokite refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Dark Ochre processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Dark Ochre refining waste per skill level.
Skill at operating mining lasers requiring Deep Core Mining. 20% reduction per skill level in the chance of a damage cloud forming while mining Mercoxit.
Needed to manufacture boosters
Skill at harvesting gas clouds. Allows use of one gas cloud harvester per level.

Specialization in Gneiss processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Gneiss refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Hedbergite processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Hedbergite refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Hemorphite processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Hemorphite refining waste per skill level.
Skill at mining ice. 5% reduction per skill level to the cycle time of ice harvesters.
Skill for Ice processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Ice refining waste per skill level.
Allows basic operation of factories. 4% reduction in manufacturing time per skill level.

Specialization in Jaspet processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Jaspet refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Kernite processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Kernite refining waste per skill level.
Allows the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per level.

Specialization in Mercoxit processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Mercoxit refining waste per skill level.
Skill at using mining lasers. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.
Skill at using mining upgrades. 5% reduction per skill level in CPU penalty of mining upgrade modules.
Skill for operating a Mobile Refinery.
Skill for operating a Mobile Factory.

Specialization in Omber processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Omber refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Plagioclase processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Plagioclase refining waste per skill level.
Skill at efficiently using factories. 4% reduction per skill level to the material requirements needed for production.

Specialization in Pyroxeres processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Pyroxeres refining waste per skill level.
Advanced skill at using refineries. 4% reduction in refinery waste per skill level.
Skill at using refineries. 2% reduction in refinery waste per skill level.

Specialization in Scordite processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Scordite refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Scrapmetal processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in scrapmetal refining waste per skill level.

Specialization in Spodumain processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Spodumain refining waste per skill level.

Proficiency at starting manufacturing jobs remotely. Each level increases the distance at which jobs can be created. Level 1 allows for range within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for full regional range.

Specialization in Veldspar processing and refining. Allows a skilled refiner to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 5% reduction in Veldspar refining waste per skill level.

Basic proficiency at coordinating armored warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to gang members' armor hit points per skill level. Only the bonus of the gang member with the highest level in this skill is used.
Note: Gang bonuses only affect gang members in space within the same solar system
Advanced proficiency at armored warfare. 100% bonus to effectiveness of armored warfare link modules per level.
Allows command of a Fleet. Grants the Fleet Commander the ability to command a new Wing per skill level, up to a maximum of 5 Wings.

Basic proficiency at coordinating information warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to gang members' targeting range per skill level. Only the bonus of the gang member with the highest level in this skill is used.
Note: Gang bonuses only affect gang members in space within the same solar system
Advanced proficiency at information warfare. 100% bonus to effectiveness of information warfare link modules per level.
Allows command of a squadron. Increases maximum squadron size by 2 members per skill level, up to a maximum of 10 members.
Advanced proficiency at group mining. 100% bonus to effectiveness of Mining Foreman link modules per level.
Basic proficiency at coordinating mining operations. Grants a 2% bonus to gang members' mining yield per level. Only the bonus of the gang member with the highest level in this skill is used.

Basic proficiency at coordinating a gang's defenses. Grants a 2% bonus to gang members' shield capacity per skill level. Only the bonus of the gang member with the highest level in this skill is used.
Note: Gang bonuses only affect gang members in space within the same solar system
Advanced proficiency at siege warfare. 100% bonus to effectiveness of siege warfare link modules per level.

Basic proficiency at coordinating hit-and-run warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to gang members' maximum velocity per skill level. Only the bonus of the gang member with the highest level in this skill is used.
Note: Gang bonuses only affect gang members in space within the same solar system
Advanced proficiency at skirmish warfare. 100% bonus to effectiveness of skirmish warfare link modules per level.
Improved gang leadership. Boosts effectiveness of all warfare link modules by 10% per level.
Allows command of a Wing. Grants the Wing Commander the ability to operate a new Squadron per skill level, up to a maximum of 5 Squadrons.
1 point bonus to your Intelligence attribute per skill level.

SOCT Advanced awareness training. While this training obviously is of great value to anyone, the most impressive results are achieved by students with great latent potential. These students develop almost superhuman sensory abilities and can react to stimuli so fast that, to the untrained eye, it almost seems as if they can predict the future.
Adds 1 additional point to your Perception attribute per skill level.

SOCT Advanced mnemonic training. While this training obviously is of great value to anyone, the most impressive results are achieved by students with great latent potential, allowing them to recall nearly anything they have ever experienced with total lucidity.
Adds 1 additional point to your Memory attribute per skill level.
1 point bonus to your Charisma attribute per skill level.

SOCT Advanced self-discipline training. While this training obviously is of great value to anyone, the most impressive results are achieved by students with great latent potential. These students are able to remain focused and alert under extreme pressure, and can ignore pain and fatigue for extended periods of time.
Adds 1 additional point to your Willpower attribute per skill level.
1 point bonus to your Memory attribute per skill level.
1 point bonus to your Willpower attribute per skill level.
2% bonus per level to all attributes resulting in a overall faster skill training time.

SOCT Advanced intelligence training. While this training obviously is of great value to anyone, the most impressive results are achieved by students with great latent potential. These students develop an intuitive understanding of complex patterns and are able to grasp esoteric concepts with incredible ease.
Adds 1 additional point to your Intelligence attribute per skill level.

SOCT Advanced social consciousness training. While this training obviously is of great value to anyone, the most impressive results are achieved by students with great latent potential. Training in this skill allows a student to develop heightened mental sensitivity, to the point of being able to sense the surface mood and emotions of a person.
Adds 1 additional point to your Charisma attribute per skill level.
1 point bonus to your Perception attribute per skill level.

Advanced understanding of armor subsystems. Allows makeshift modifications to armor subsystems through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Armor Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of a ships navigational subsystems. Allows makeshift modifications to warp drive, sub warp drive and other navigational subsystems through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Astronautics Rig drawbacks per level.
Operation of capital sized remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital remote armor repair system modules per skill level.
Operation of remote capital class remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital class remote hull repair system modules per skill level.
Operation of capital armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in capital repair systems duration per skill level.
Skill at the construction of capital ships.
Skill at the construction of advanced cruisers. Required for advanced cruiser BP manufacturing

Advanced understanding of a ships drone control subsystems. Allows makeshift modifications to drone subsystems through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Drone Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of electronics subsystems. Allows makeshift modifications to targeting, scanning and ECM systems through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Electronic Superiority Rig drawbacks per level.
To active armor hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Armor EM resistance when the modules are not active To passive armor hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Armor EM resistance

Advanced understanding of the interface between energy weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Energy Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.
To active armor hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Armor Explosive resistance when the modules are not active To passive armor hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Armor Explosive resistance
Skill at the construction of advanced frigates. Required for advanced frigate BP manufacturing
Skill at maintaining your ship's armour and installing hull upgrades like expanded cargoholds and inertial stabilizers. Grants a 5% bonus to armor hit points per skill level.

Advanced understanding of the interface between hybrid weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Hybrid Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.
Skill at the construction of advanced industrials.

General understanding of the inner workings of starship components. Allows makeshift modifications to ship subsystems through the use of rigs. Required learning for further study in the field of rigging.
To active armor hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Armor Kinetic resistance when the modules are not active To passive armor hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Armor Kinetic resistance

Advanced understanding of the interface between Missile Launchers and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Launcher Rig drawbacks per level.
Skill at maintaining the mechanical components and structural integrity of a spaceship. 5% bonus to structure hit points per skill level.
Skill at constructing outposts.

Advanced understanding of the interface between projectile weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Projectile Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.
Operation of remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote armor repair system modules per skill level.
Operation of remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote hull repair system modules per skill level.
Operation of armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in repair systems duration per skill level.
Proficiency at salvaging ship wrecks. Required skill for the use of salvager modules. 5% increase in chance of salvage retrieval per level.

Advanced understanding of shield subsystems. Allows makeshift modifications to shield subsystems through the use of rigs.
10% reduction in Shield Rig drawbacks per level.
Skill at the operation of triage modules. 50-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level.
To active armor hardeners: 3% bonus per skill level to Armor Thermal resistance when the modules are not active To passive armor hardeners: 5% bonus per skill level to Armor Thermal resistance
Basic operation of bomb delivery systems. 5% reduction of Bomb Launcher reactivation delay per skill level.
Skill at the handling and firing of citadel torpedoes. 5% bonus to citadel torpedo damage per skill level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced cruise missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Cruise Missile Specialization.
Skill at the handling and firing of very large guided missiles. 5% bonus to cruise missile damage per skill level.
Skill with anti-missile missiles.Special: 5% bonus to defender missile max velocity per skill level.
Skill with friend or foe missiles. Special: 5% bonus to F.O.F (light, heavy and cruise) damage per skill level.

Skill at precision missile homing. Proficiency at this skill increases the accuracy of a fired missile's exact point of impact, resulting in greater damage to small targets. 5% decreased factor of signature radius for light, heavy and cruise missile explosions per level of skill.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Missile Specialization.
Skill with heavy missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy missile damage per skill level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Missile Specialization.
Skill with heavy missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy missile damage per skill level.
Proficiency at long-range missile combat. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum flight time per level.
Basic operation of missile launcher systems. 2% Bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per skill level.
Skill at boosting missile bay propulsion systems and manipulating guided missiles' jet engines. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum velocity per level.
Proficiency at rapid missile launcher firing. 3% bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced rocket launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Rocket Specialization.
Skill with small short range missiles.Special: 5% bonus to rocket damage per skill level.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced standard missile launchers and assault launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Standard Missile Specialization.
Skill with manually targeted missiles.Special: 5% Bonus to light missile damage per skill level.
Proficiency at optimizing a missile's flight path to negate the effects of a target's speed upon the explosion's impact. 10% decrease per level in factor of target's velocity for all missiles.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced siege launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Torpedo Specialization.
Skill at the handling and firing of torpedoes. 5% bonus to torpedo damage per skill level.
Proficiency at upgrading missile warheads with deadlier payloads. 2% bonus to all missile damage per skill level.
Skill at efficiently using Afterburners and MicroWarpdrives. 5% Bonus to Afterburner and MicroWarpdrive speed boost per skill level.
Skill at using afterburners. 10% bonus to Afterburner duration per skill level.
Improved skill at efficiently turning and accelerating a spaceship. 5% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.
Improved control over afterburner energy consumption. 10% reduction in afterburner capacitor needs per skill level.
Skill at using MicroWarpdrives. 5% reduction in MicroWarpdrive capacitor usage per skill level.
Advanced skill at using Jump Drives. Each skill level grants a 25% increase in maximum jump range.
Skill at using Jump Drives. Each skill level reduces the capacitor need of initiating a jump by 5%.
Proficiency at regulating energy flow to the jump drive. 100-unit reduction in ice consumption amount for jump drive operation per light year per skill level.
Skill at regulating the power output of ship thrusters. 5% bonus to sub-warp ship velocity per skill level.
Skill at managing warp drive efficiency. Each skill level reduces the capacitor need of initiating warp by 10%.
Skill at navigating in warp. 10% Bonus to warp accuracy and 10% less max range from desired warp location per level
Further training in the operation of multiple laboratories. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Amarr Empire and its allies.

Skill and knowledge of Amarrian Starship Engineering.
Used Exclusively in the research of Amarrian Ships of all Sizes.
Allows Amarrian Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Proficiency at identifying and analyzing ancient artifacts. Required skill for the use of Analyzer modules. 5% increase in chance of archaeological find per level.
Skill at analyzing the content of celestial objects with the intent of mining them. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.
Greater accuracy in hunting down targets found through scanning. Reduces maximum scan deviation by 10% per level.
Skill at the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% scan strength bonus per level of skill.
Skill at operating long range scanners. Adds one scan group per level.

Skill and knowledge of Astronautics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Allows Astronautic Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. It is also needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
The science of life and of living organisms, and how chemicals affect them. 20% Bonus to attribute booster duration per skill level.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Caldari State and its allies.

Skill and knowledge of Caldari Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses in the research of Caldari Ships of all Sizes.
Allows Caldari Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints

Needed for use of the Clone Vat Bay module.
Special: Increases a Clone Vat Bay's maximum capacity by 5 clones per skill level.
The science of interfacing biological and machine components. Allows the use of cybernetic implants.
The skill interfacing with ship energy and structural diagnostics systems. Allows the use of advanced diagnostics implants.
Skill at operating titan doomsday weapons. 10% increased damage per level.

Skill at duplicating items using a Molecular sequencer. While molecular sequencing does usually involve some basic understanding of the item being duplicated it is really more of an art than it is a science and often involves a great deal of trial and error to get right. Skill level x Item duplication chance = chance of succesfully duplicating a item

Skill and knowledge of Electromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of Railgun weaponry and various electronic systems.
Allows Electromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Electronic Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Used in all Electronics and Drone research.
Allows Electronic Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Gallente Federation and its allies.

Skill and knowledge of Gallente Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses in the research of Gallente Ships of all Sizes.
Allows Gallente Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
The science of interfacing biological and machine components. Allows the use of DNA mutators.

Skill and knowledge of Graviton physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of Cloaking and other spatial distortion devices as well as Graviton based missiles and smartbombs.
Allows Graviton Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.
The skill interfacing with a ships turrets. Allows the use of advanced gunnery implants.
Proficiency at breaking into guarded computer systems. Required skill for the use of codebreaker modules. 5% increase in chance of data retrieval per level.

Skill and knowledge of High Energy Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of various energy system modules as well as smartbombs and laser based weaponry.
Allows High Energy Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints

Skill and knowledge of Hydromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of shield system.
Allows Hydromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.
Skill and knowledge of Hypernet Technology such as Hacking decks, Codebreakers and Parasites.

Psychological training which strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. The reality of having ones conscious detached from their physical form, scattered across the galaxy and then placed in a vat grown clone can be very unsettling to the untrained mind.
Allows 1 jump clone per level.
Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.
Skill for the generation of jump portals to distant solar systems. 10% reduced material cost for jump portal activation per level.
Allows basic operation of research facilities. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.

Skill and knowledge of Laser Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology.
Uses primarily in the research of Laser weaponry as well as EM based missiles and smartbombs.
Allows Laser Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Mechanical Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Used in all Starship research as well as hull and armor repair systems.
Allows Mechanical Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Advanced knowledge of mineral composition. 5% Bonus to material efficiency research speed per skill level.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Minmatar Republic and its allies.

Skill and knowledge of Minmatar Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses in the research of Minmatar Ships of all Sizes.
Allows Minmatar Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Skill at handling skill stimulator boosters. 20% Bonus to skill booster duration per level.

Skill and knowledge of Molecular Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of various hull and propulsion systems.
Allows Molecular Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.
Proficiency at reducing the severity of the side effects experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

Skill and knowledge of Nanorobotics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of various armor and hull systems.
Allows Nanite Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Proficiency at biofeedback techniques intended to negate the side effects typically experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

Skill and knowledge of Nuclear physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of Projectile weaponry as well as Nuclear missiles and smartbombs.
Allows Nuclear Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Plasma physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of particle blaster weaponry as well as plasma based missiles and smartbombs.
Allows Plasma Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints

Skill and knowledge of Quantum Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology.
Uses primarily in the research of shield systems and Particle Blasters.
Allows Quantum Physics research to be performed through a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.
The skill interfacing with Remote systems such as drones and missiles . Allows the use of advanced Remote implants.
Skill at researching more efficient production methods. 5% bonus to blueprint manufacturing time research per skill level.
Skill at overseeing agent research and development projects. Allows the simultaneous use of 1 additional Research and Development agent per skill level.
Skill at illegaly creating blueprints from items . Skill level x Item Reverse engineering chance = Chance of reverse engineering a Item into a blueprint

Skill and knowledge of Rocket Science and its use in the development of advanced technology.
Uses primarily in the research of missiles and propulsion systems.
Allows Rocket Science research to be performed with the help of a research agent.
Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints
Basic understanding of scientific principles. 5% Bonus to blueprint copying speed per level.

Skill at running research operations remotely. Each level increases the distance at which research projects can be started. Level 1 allows for range within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for full regional range.
Skill for the advanced operation of long range scanners. 10% faster scanning with scan probes per level.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Sleeper technology.
The Sleepers were masters of virtual reality, neural interfacing and cryotechnology.
Allows the rudimentary use of Sleeper components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Takmahl technology.
The Takmahl nation excelled in cybernetics and bio-engineering.
Allows the rudimentary use of Takmahl components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Talocan technology.
The Talocan were masters of Spatial manipulation and Hypereuclidean Mathematics.
Allows the rudimentary use of Talocan components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Yan Jung technology.
The Yan Jung nation possessed advanced gravitronic technology and force field theories.
Allows the rudimentary use of Yan Jung components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Understanding of corporate bureaucracies.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Administration Internal Security Personnel Storage Archives Financial
Skill at interacting with friendly NPCs. 4% Bonus to effective standing towards friendly NPC Corporations.
Skill at interacting with criminal NPCs. 0.4 bonus to effective standing towards NPCs with low Concord standing.

Skill at dealing with Concord Department and negotiating bounties
Bonus fee of 1.500 isk per pirate head per level of the skill
Skill at interacting with hostile Agents. 0.4 Bonus per level to effective standing towards hostile Agents.
Skill at interacting with Concord. 5% Bonus to effective security rating increase.

Understanding of Corporate Finances.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Public Relations Marketing Legal Accounting Financial Distribution

Understanding of high-tech corporate culture.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Archives Advisory Intelligence Manufacturing Surveillance

Understanding of corporate culture on the industrial level and the plight of the worker.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Manufacturing Production Personnel Mining Astrosurveying

Understanding of military culture.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Intelligence Security Astrosurveying Command Internal Security Surveillance
Skill at agent negotiation. Improves agent effective quality. 5% additional pay per skill level for agent missions.

Understanding of political concepts and stratagems.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Security Legal Administration Advisory Command Public Relations
Skill at social interaction. 5% Bonus to NPC agent, corporation and faction standing increase.

Understanding of the way trade is conducted at the corporate level.
Improves loyalty point gain by 5% per level when working for agents in the following corporation divisions:
Distribution Storage Production Accounting Mining Marketing
The advanced operation of spaceships. Grants a 5% Bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring Advanced Spaceship Command. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr battleships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr carriers.
Skill at operating Amarr cruisers.
Skill at operating Amarr dreadnoughts. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr freighters. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr frigates.
Skill at operating Amarr industrial ships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr titans.
Skill for operation of the Assault Ship class frigates. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Battlecruisers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari battleships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari carriers.
Skill at operating Caldari cruisers.
Skill at operating Caldari dreadnoughts. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill at operating Caldari frigates.

The operation of capital ships. Grants a 5% bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring the Capital Ships skill. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Carriers and Motherships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the operation of Command Ships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Concord .

Covert operations frigates are designed for recon and espionage operation. Their main strength is the ability to travel unseen through enemy territory and to avoid unfavorable encounters Much of their free space is sacrificed to house an advanced spatial field control system. This allows it to utilize very advanced forms of cloaking at greatly reduced CPU cost. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Destroyers.
Skill for the operation of elite mining barges. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Wing Command Carriers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente battleships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente carriers.
Skill at operating Gallente cruisers.
Skill at operating Gallente dreadnoughts. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente freighters. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente frigates.
Skill at operating Gallente industrial ships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente titans.
Skill for operation of the Heavy Assault class cruisers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
The Operation Of Advanced Interceptor class Frigates. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
The Operation Of Advanced Interdictor class Destroyers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating jove battleships.
Skill at operating Jovian industrial ships.
Skill at operating Support Cruisers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating ORE Mining Barges. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar battleships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar carriers.
Skill at operating Minmatar cruisers.
Skill at operating Minmatar dreadnoughts. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar freighters. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar frigates.
Skill at operating Minmatar industrial ships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar titans.
Those who possess this are all knowing and all seeing with unlimited power and authority.
Skill at operating Polaris.
Skill for the operation of Recon Ships. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
The basic operation of spaceships. 2% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.
Skill for operation of the Transport Ship class industrials. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Proficiency at squaring away the odds and ends of business transactions, keeping the check books tight. Each level of skill reduces transaction tax by 10%.
Skill at forging cargo manifest and disguising contraband cargo. from a base chance 90%, each level of skill reduces the chance of contraband detection by 10%.

Proficiency at driving down market-related costs. Each level of skill grants a 5% reduction in the costs associated with setting up a market order, which usually come to 1% of the order's total value. This can be further influenced by the player's standing towards the owner of the station where the order is entered.

This skill allows you to create formal agreements with other characters.
For each level of this skill the number of outstanding contracts is increased by three (up to a maximum of 15 at level 5)
Note: Can not be trained on trial accounts

You are familiar with the intricacies of formalizing contracts between yourself and others. You can not create contracts on behalf of your corporation without this skill.
For each level of this skill the number of concurrent inner-corporation/alliance contracts you make on behalf of your corporation is increased by 10.
This has no effect on public contracts or contracts you make personally.

Allows for remote modification of buy and sell orders. Each level of skill increases the range at which orders may be modified. Level 1 allows for modification of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for market order modification anywhere within current region.

Ability to make potentially risky investments work in your favor. Each level of skill reduces the percentage of ISK placed in market escrow when entering buy orders. Starting with an escrow percentage of 100% at Level 1, each skill level cumulatively reduces the percentage by 25%.

Skill at selling items remotely. Each level increases the range from the seller to the item being sold. Level 1 allows for the sale of items within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for sale of items located anywhere within current region.

Proficiency at placing remote buy orders on the market. Level 1 allows for the placement of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for placement of remote buy orders anywhere within current region.
Note: placing buy orders and directly buying an item are not the same thing. Direct remote purchase requires no skill.
Ability to organize and manage market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 8.
Knowledge of the market and skill at manipulating it. Active sell order limit increased by 4 per level of skill.
Ability to organize and manage ultra large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 32.

Skill at acquiring products remotely. Each level of skill increases your remote buy order range. Level 1 allows for the placing of buy orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for a full regional range.
Note: Only remotely placed buy orders (using Procurement) require this skill to alter the range. Any range can be set on a local buy order with no skill.
Ability to organize and manage large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 16.
